recipes.Name: Low FODMAP Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.Instructions: 1. Cook the gluten-free spaghetti according to the package instructions. 2. Heat garlic-infused oil in a pan, add green onion tops and sauté until softened. 3. Add ground beef and cook until browned. 4. Stir in canned tomatoes, diced carrots, zucchini, salt, pepper, and dried basil, and simmer for 20-25 minutes. 5. Serve the sauce over cooked gluten-free spaghetti and garnish with grated Parmesan cheese (optional).
recipes.Comments: For a vegetarian option, you can replace the ground beef with canned lentils (rinsed and drained) or a low FODMAP veggie crumble. Ensure that all ingredients used are certified Low FODMAP.

recipes.Name: Low FODMAP Grilled Chicken Salad
recipes.Instructions: 1. Season chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and dried oregano. 2. Heat a grill or grill pan and cook chicken breasts for 5-6 minutes per side or until cooked through. 3. In a large bowl, mix together lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, and green onion tops. 4. Whisk together garlic-infused oil, lemon juice, and Dijon mustard for the dressing. 5. Slice the cooked chicken and add it to the salad. 6. Drizzle the dressing over the salad, and toss to combine.
recipes.Comments: You can customize this salad with other Low FODMAP vegetables or protein sources, such as grilled shrimp or tofu.

recipes.Name: Low FODMAP Lemon Polenta Cake
recipes.Instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C) and grease an 8-inch (20 cm) round cake pan. 2. In a large bowl, mix together almond meal, polenta, baking powder, and salt. 3. In another bowl, whisk together the eggs, sugar, and lemon zest. 4. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the egg mixture and mix until combined. 5. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and bake for 35-40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. 6. Allow the cake to cool in the pan before transferring it to a serving plate.
recipes.Comments: For a zesty glaze, mix 0.5 cup of powdered sugar with 2-3 tbsp of fresh lemon juice and drizzle over the cooled cake.
